name: Restoration, Greater
text: This spell functions like lesser restoration, except that it dispels all permanent and temporary negative levels afflicting the healed creature. Greater restoration also dispels all magical effects penalizing the creature's abilities, cures all temporary ability damage, and restores all points permanently drained from all ability scores. It also eliminates fatigue and exhaustion, and removes all forms of insanity, confusion, and similar mental effects.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (价值5000gp的钻石尘)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘次等复原术 (lesser restoration)’一般，不过它能消除被医治生物的所有永久与暂时负向等级。高等复原术也能解除所有能对生物造成的属性减值的魔法效果，治疗目标受到的所有暂时属性伤害，并回复所有被吸取的属性值。它同时还能消除目标受到的任何疲乏或力竭效果，并且它还能移除所有形式的疯狂 (insanity)、困惑 (confusion) 以及类似的精神效果。
